name: Battle Of Tarlis
description:
• Campaign with 8 large maps (each map have different biome)
  • Each level grants you passive skill (attack speed, armor, life)
  • Battle enemy minions with sword, axe, hammer or even bow!
  • After completing campaign you can play it again on higher difficulties!
  • Use the skill any you want (spear, shield, transform, swap item, potion healing)
  • Collect items from the ground dropped by enemies to your inventory
